at.htl.geometrics

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.htl.geometrics.Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a triangle with the 3 corner points or 3 lines. If the Points are edited the lines are automatically updated and vice versa. Also the bisecting points of the triangle lines are stored.
    Author:
    Jakob Ecker, Dominik Simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Triangle()
      Constructs a new empty Triangel-Object

      Constructs a new Triangle-Object form 3 lines

      Constructs a new Triangle-Object from 3 points
